metadata.Title: CVE-2013-6428 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description:
The ReST API in OpenStack Orchestration API (Heat) before Havana 2013.2.1 and Icehouse before icehouse-2 allows remote authenticated users to bypass the tenant scoping restrictions via a modified tenant_id in the request path.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2013-6428` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

heat-api - 2014.1~rc1-0ubuntu1
heat-api-cfn - 2014.1~rc1-0ubuntu1
heat-api-cloudwatch - 2014.1~rc1-0ubuntu1
heat-common - 2014.1~rc1-0ubuntu1
heat-engine - 2014.1~rc1-0ubuntu1
python-heat - 2014.1~rc1-0ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: heat package in trusty, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2014.1~rc1-0ubuntu1').
